properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 15 at 3:12AM EST until February 16 at 6:00AM EST by NWS Gray ME
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Small Craft Advisory and southwest winds 10 to 20
kt with gusts to 25 kt. Seas 2 to 4 feet. Also, for a Freezing
Spray Advisory with light to moderate accumulation of freezing
spray.

* WHERE...Casco and Penobscot Bays.

* WHEN...For the Small Craft Advisory, from 7 PM this evening to
6 AM EST Sunday. For the Freezing Spray Advisory, until 6 AM
EST early this morning.

* IMPACTS...Operating a vessel in freezing spray is hazardous.
Freezing spray may render mechanical and electronic components
inoperative. Ice accretion on decks and superstructures may
result in some loss of stability. Conditions will be hazardous
to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should prepare for accumulation of ice on their vessel
and consider altering plans to avoid or mitigate these hazardous
navigating conditions.

Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: FREEZING SPRAY ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM EST EARLY THIS MORNING... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM EST SUNDAY
